Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav played a gritty innings of 68 off 40 deliveries with a strike rate of 170.00, striking 6 fours and 3 sixes
Pre-Game Insights: India were in a dire need of a partnership and they pinned their hopes on Suryakumar Yadav
Captain Rohit Sharma won the toss and opted to bat first on a difficult Perth wicket
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Indian top order was bundled out under 50 after KL Rahul was dismissed by Kagiso Rabada in the first over
Others: The match was part of the T20 World Cup 2022
